response.original_title: David Gilmour - The West Coast Documentary
response.overview: David Gilmour's The West Coast Documentary as included on Disc 2 of the 2-disc special edition DVD of Remember That Night, live at The Royal Albert Hall.  The West Coast Documentary was filmed between shows in Los Angeles and features shots of Pink Floyd's co-founding member, Richard Wright. Included in this special edition DVD of Remember That Night, there are an additional 3 documentaries, 5 bonus tracks from The Royal Albert Hall performances, footage from The Mermaid Theatre concert (March 2006) and lots more bonus content.
response.title: David Gilmour - The West Coast Documentary
